originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Shakiba! He was able to diagnosis and give me solutions when other doctors hadn't been able to. I saw him and he knew right away what I needed to have done. He explained everything and was very patient. The office is always responsive and very kind and understanding. They following up after procedures to ensure you are better than ever. They also have several machines and techniques in office, like radio frequency machines to get you back to everything working the way it should.

originalText.text: Dr Shakiba was the first doctor to finally listen to my symptoms and describe why I was feeling the way I was for so many years. He was so kind and informative, and made me feel at ease! The world needs more physicians like him who advocate for Women’s Health!

originalText.text: Doctor. Kateryna is very nice. She’s very gentle and kind during the exam. The office is clean and well mainted. Front staff is very welcoming as well. Overall a good experience on my first visit here .

text.text: Doctor. Kateryna is very nice. She’s very gentle and kind during the exam. The office is clean and well mainted. Front staff is very welcoming as well. Overall a good experience on my first visit here .

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Shakiba! After months of struggling with bladder issues and seeing multiple doctors, Dr. Shakiba stood out for his thorough examination and ability to identify the root cause of my condition. He's not only knowledgeable but also kind and patient, ensuring I felt cared for during each visit. Despite my repeated questions, he took the time to answer without making me feel rushed. Now, with a scheduled surgery ahead, his confidence instills a strong sense of safety. Special mention to Joanne, whose support and guidance eased my stress throughout the process. Both Dr. Shakiba and Joanne are incredibly supportive and compassionate. I only wish I had found this practice sooner!!!!

originalText.text: I see Dr Kolesnikova and she is very knowledgeable and ready to help. She has shown great interest in helping me get through a difficult menopause.   I am grateful.
